reference_image_path_and_text_pairs: A front view portrait of Queen Sera.

EXT. RUINS - FORGED ALLIANCE. A chaotic battlefield setting is visible, filled with the surging tide of the Skeletal Legion (The Risen Dead). In the foreground, Queen Sera, armored in polished obsidian, and The Wolf, a savage-looking warrior with a scarred face, stand opposite each other, locked in an intense eye contact across the melee.
text_prompt:
Create an image following the given description: 
EXT. RUINS - FORGED ALLIANCE. The chaotic battlefield setting from Image 2 should be maintained. Queen Sera, whose appearance is based on Image 0, and The Wolf, whose appearance is based on Image 1, are deeply engaged in hand-to-hand combat against the Skeletal Legion (The Risen Dead), which is composed of decaying bone. The engagement should be similar in composition to Image 2, showing Queen Sera and The Wolf fighting on the battlefield.
